thread.title: NFL's Adrian Peterson's Woodlands mansion price reduced by nearly $2 million
thread.title_full: NFL's Adrian Peterson's Woodlands mansion price reduced by nearly $2 million

author: Darla Guillen, Houston Chronicle
title: NFL's Adrian Peterson's Woodlands mansion price reduced by nearly $2 million
text:

Photo: Courtesy Of Keller Williams Real Image 30 of 31 An aerial view of the back of the property. An aerial view of the back of the property. Photo: Keller Williams Realty NFL's Adrian Peterson's Woodlands mansion price reduced by nearly $2 million 1 / 31 Back to Gallery 
After listing his sprawling Woodlands estate last summer , Adrian Peterson has already slashed the list price by $1.8 million. 
The Minnesota Vikings running back's house was listed last June for $8.5 million, but is now marked for $6.7 million. 
The Texas native's 10,582-square-foot, six-bedroom, 10-bath house has an expansive wine cellar, two-story wood-paneled library, theater and large motor court. Built in 2004, the house has a game room with a full bar and a shaded balcony that overlooks the property. 
ANOTHER TEXAS MANSION: Former UT Longhorns football coach's Austin home on the market for nearly $5 million 
There's also a nanny's quarters with a separate entrance and private sauna. 
In the kitchen, wood-paneled custom finishes, exposed brick architectural detail and a granite counter-top island that stretches almost the expanse of the room. 
The master suite has a domed seating area with fireplace and bay window that offers serene panoramas of the heavily wooded nine-acre lot in The Woodlands's Grogan's Mill subdivision. 
Outside, two fully equipped summer kitchens have a view of the lot's mature trees and the home's serene swimming pool. Just beyond the patios is a waterfall-adjacent fire pit and seating area. 
Courtney Johnson Rose with George E. Johnson Properties has the listing. Subscribe to HCN
